text: Mina Q'asa (Spanish mina mine, Quechua q'asa mountain pass, "mine pass", also spelled Minajasa) is a mountain in the Wansu mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is situated in the Apurímac Region, Antabamba Province, Oropesa District. Mina Q'asa lies south of Puka Urqu and southeast of Millu. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Apurímac Region
title: Mina Q'asa
